jobDescription: Kyriba is the global leader in cloud-based treasury, cash and risk management solutions, delivering Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) financial technology to corporate CFOs and Treasurers. More than 1,800 global organizations use Kyriba to enhance their global cash visibility, improve financial controls, and increase productivity across their cash and liquidity, payments, supply chain finance and risk management operations. Kyriba is headquartered in New York, with offices in San Diego, Paris, London, Tokyo, Singapore, Dubai, Hong Kong, Shanghai and Rio de Janeiro. Kyriba added more than 230 new customer logos during the year and is growing at a fast pace!  Reporting to a Senior Implementation Manager, the Implementation Consultant is responsible for supporting the delivery of high-quality implementation projects. Implementation Consultants have responsibility for applying best practices for all implementation work and following Kyriba implementation methodologies throughout the project phases. Remote employees will be considered based on qualifications and experience.
